about_the_game:
About the game

'Meowstery of a Growing Aurora' is a 2D side-scrolling adventure set within an exciting, but familiar setting. Travel through the world of the VR-MMORPG Shenanghia and help Rhyn find a way to shrink her pet cat, Aurora!

Key Features

  • Meticulously created levels spanning from dense jungles to monster infested castles

  • An engaging story with multiple endings (should you be quick and bold enough to earn them)

  • Non-Metroidvania progression; “Meowstery of a Growing Aurora” is a linear game, with different stages, and upgrades being awarded once a level has been reached

  • The ability to pet Aurora (in both her small and large state)

Story

The year is 20XX, and Eleanor (in-game name Rhyn), a player of the mega-popular Virtual Reality MMORPG Shenanghia has agreed to an interview with Mr. Slater, a freelance gaming journalist; to tell her side of the story from that fateful afternoon in December 203X, when Aurora, her in-game pet cat grew to massive proportions.

Released in the not-so-distant future of 20XX, Shenanghia is a Virtual Reality MMORPG that took the world by storm.

Built on the promise that its servers will never go offline, and anything that happens in the game’s world is persistent, its players have started calling it their new home, almost like a second (virtual) life.

Bonds are made, relationships built (and ruined), and jobs are created.

However, every game has its dips in popularity.

And every time the number of players active on Shenanghia’s servers starts to dip, a near cataclysmic event happens!

From Lizardfolk rising up from the swamplands and briefly taking over the central kingdoms, to Werewolves massively increasing their numbers every time they kill something in the game; something always occurs.

And from those occurrences the Bounty Bands were born!

Consisting of high-level players with a thirst for glory, these groups take on the deadliest challenges, clear the trickiest dungeons, and hunt any creature (or player) that would pose a big enough threat to be noticed by the community.

Is Aurora another such occurrence? Are the Bounty Bands going to hunt Rhyn alongside her pet kitty-kat? Or is Rhyn going to find a way to make Aurora regular sized again?

Only one way to find out.

  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i9-9900KF
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible soundcard or onboard chipset

short_description: 'Meowstery of a Growing Aurora' is a 2D pixel-art adventure set within the fictional VR-MMORPG Shenanghia, where you step into the shoes of Eleanor, as she has to save her pet cat Aurora from danger lurking within the game.
